data.lean: lemma example1 (x y z : mynat) : x * y + z = x * y + z :=
lemma example2 (x y : mynat) (h : y = x + 7) : 2 * y = 2 * (x + 7) :=
lemma example3 (a b : mynat) (h : succ a = b) : succ(succ(a)) = succ(b) :=
lemma add_succ_zero (a : mynat) : a + succ(0) = succ(a) :=
lemma zero_add (n : mynat) : 0 + n = n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rw add_zero,
refl,

rw add_succ 0 d,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a + b) + c = a + (b + c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with cb ib,
rw add_zero (a+b),
rw add_zero b,
refl,

rw add_succ (a+b) cb,
rw ib,
rw add_succ b cb,
rw add_succ a (b + cb),
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_add (a b : mynat) : succ a + b = succ (a + b) :=
data.editorText:
induction b with bc ic,
rw add_zero (succ a),
rw add_zero a,
refl,

rw add_succ (succ a) bc,
rw add_succ a bc,
rw ic,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_comm (a b : mynat) : a + b = b + a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with bc ip,
rw add_zero a,
rw zero_add a,
refl,

rw add_succ a bc,
rw ip,
rw succ_add bc a,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_add_one (n : mynat) : succ n = n + 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw add_succ n 0,
rw add_zero n,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_right_comm (a b c : mynat) : a + b + c = a + c + b :=
data.editorText:
rw add_comm a b,
rw add_assoc b a c,
rw add_comm b (a+c),
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_mul (m : mynat) : 0 * m = 0 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with n ip,
rw mul_zero 0,
refl,

rw mul_succ 0,
rw ip,
rw add_zero 0,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_one (m : mynat) : m * 1 = m :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw mul_succ m,
rw mul_zero m,
rw zero_add m,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_mul (m : mynat) : 1 * m = m :=
data.editorText:
induction m with n bc,
rw mul_zero 1,
refl,

rw mul_succ 1,
rw bc,
rw succ_eq_add_one,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_add (t a b : mynat) : t * (a + b) = t * a + t * b :=
data.editorText:
induction a with u bc1,
  -- caso base
  rw zero_add b,
  rw mul_zero t,
  rw zero_add (t * b),
  refl,

-- passo indutivo
  rw succ_add u b,
  rw mul_succ t (u+b),
  rw bc1,
  rw add_assoc,
  rw add_comm (t*b) t,
  rw ← add_assoc,
  rw mul_succ t u,
  refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a * b) * c = a * (b * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d bc,
-- caso base
  repeat {rw mul_zero},

-- passo indutivo
  rw mul_succ (a*b) d,
  rw bc,
  rw mul_succ b d,
  rw mul_add,
  refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_mul (a b : mynat) : succ a * b = a * b + b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with c bc,
  -- caso base
  rw mul_zero (succ a),
  rw mul_zero a,
  rw add_zero 0,
  refl,

  -- passo indutivo
  rw mul_succ (succ a),
  rw add_succ (succ a * c),
  rw bc,
  rw mul_succ a c,
  rw add_succ (a*c + a) c,
  rw add_assoc (a*c) c a,
  rw add_comm c a,
  rw add_assoc (a*c) a c,
  refl,

data.lean: lemma add_mul (a b t : mynat) : (a + b) * t = a * t + b * t :=
data.editorText:
induction t with u bc,
  -- caso base
  repeat {rw mul_zero},
  rw add_zero 0,
  refl,

  -- passo indutivo
  rw mul_succ (a+b) u,
  rw bc,
  repeat {rw mul_succ},
  rw add_assoc (a*u) a,
  rw add_comm a (b*u + b),
  rw add_assoc (b*u) b,
  rw ← add_assoc (a*u) (b*u),
  rw add_comm b a,
  refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_comm (a b : mynat) : a * b = b * a :=
data.editorText:
induction a with c bc,
  -- caso base
  rw zero_mul,
  rw mul_zero,
  refl,

  -- passo indutivo
  rw succ_mul c b,
  rw mul_succ b c,
  induction b with d bc2,
  
  repeat {rw add_zero},
  rw bc,
  refl,
  
  rw mul_succ c d,
  rw add_assoc (c*d) c,
  rw add_succ c d,
  rw ← bc,
  rw mul_succ c d,
  rw add_assoc (c*d) c,
  rw add_succ c d,
  refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_left_comm (a b c : mynat) : a * (b * c) = b * (a * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction a with d bc,
  -- caso base
  repeat {rw zero_mul},
  rw mul_zero,
  refl,

  -- passo indutivo
  rw succ_mul d (b*c),
  rw bc,
  rw succ_mul d c,
  rw mul_comm b (d*c + c),
  rw add_mul (d*c) c b,
  rw mul_comm (d*c) b,
  rw mul_comm c b,
  refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_zero : (0 : mynat) ^ (0 : mynat) = 1 :=
lemma zero_pow_succ (m : mynat) : (0 : mynat) ^ (succ m) = 0 :=
lemma pow_one (a : mynat) : a ^ (1 : mynat) = a :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw pow_succ a 0,
rw pow_zero a,
rw one_mul a,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_pow (m : mynat) : (1 : mynat) ^ m = 1 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with n bc,
  -- caso base
  rw pow_zero,
  refl,

  -- passo indutivo
  rw pow_succ 1 n,
  rw mul_one,
  rw bc,
  refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_add (a m n : mynat) : a ^ (m + n) = a ^ m * a ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction m with p bc,
  -- caso base,
  rw zero_add n,
  rw pow_zero a,
  rw one_mul,
  refl,

  -- passo indutivo
  rw succ_add p n,
  rw pow_succ,
  rw bc,
  rw pow_succ a p,
  rw mul_assoc (a^p) a,
  rw mul_comm a (a^n),
  rw ← mul_assoc (a^p) (a ^ n) a,
  refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_pow (a b n : mynat) : (a * b) ^ n = a ^ n * b ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with p bc,
  -- caso base
  repeat {rw pow_zero},
  rw mul_one,
  refl,

  -- passo indutivo
  repeat {rw pow_succ},
  rw bc,
  simp,

data.lean: lemma pow_pow (a m n : mynat) : (a ^ m) ^ n = a ^ (m * n) :=
data.editorText:
induction n with p bc,
  -- caso base
  rw pow_zero (a^m),
  rw mul_zero m,
  rw pow_zero a,
  refl,

  -- passo indutivo
  rw pow_succ (a^m) p,
  rw bc,
  rw mul_succ m p,
  rw pow_add a (m*p) m,
  refl,

data.lean:
lemma add_squared (a b : mynat) :
  (a + b) ^ (2 : mynat) = a ^ (2 : mynat) + b ^ (2 : mynat) + 2 * a * b :=
data.editorText:
rw two_eq_succ_one,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
repeat {rw pow_succ},
repeat {rw pow_zero},
repeat {rw one_mul},
rw mul_add,
rw add_assoc,
rw succ_mul,
rw succ_mul,
rw zero_mul,
rw zero_add,
rw mul_comm (a+b) a,
rw mul_comm (a+b) b,
rw mul_add,
rw mul_comm (a + a) b,
rw mul_add b a a,
rw ← add_assoc (b*b) (b*a) (b*a),
rw ← mul_add b b a,
simp,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
example : mynat → mynat :=

example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q:= h p,
have r:= i q,
have t:= j q,
have u:= l t,
exact u,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
apply l,
apply j,
apply h,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Type) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro pqr,
intro pq, 
intro p,
have q : Q := pq p,
have r : R := pqr p q,
exact r,

data.lean: example (P Q F : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → F) → (P → F)) :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
intro qf,
intro p,
exact qf (pq p),

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → empty) → (P → empty)) :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
intro qvazio,
intro p,
exact qvazio (pq p),

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Type)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
apply f15,
apply f11,
apply f9,
apply f8,
apply f5,
apply f2, 
apply f1,
exact a,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
lemma imp_self (P : Prop) : P → P :=

lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q : Q := h p,
have t : T := j q,
have u : U := l t,
exact u,

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
apply l,
apply j,
apply h,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Prop) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro pqr,
intro pq, 
intro p,
exact pqr p (pq p),

data.lean: lemma imp_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P → Q) → ((Q → R) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
intro qf,
intro p,
exact qf (pq p),

data.lean: lemma contrapositive (P Q : Prop) : (P → Q) → (¬ Q → ¬ P) :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
intro nq,
intro p,
have boom : false := nq (pq p),
exact boom,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Prop)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (q : Q) : P ∧ Q :=
lemma and_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ P :=
lemma and_trans (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ R → P ∧ R :=
lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
example (P Q : Prop) : Q → (P ∨ Q) :=
lemma or_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∨ Q → Q ∨ P :=
lemma and_or_distrib_left (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ (Q ∨ R) ↔ (P ∧ Q) ∨ (P ∧ R) :=
lemma contra (P Q : Prop) : (P ∧ ¬ P) → Q :=
lemma contrapositive2 (P Q : Prop) : (¬ Q → ¬ P) → (P → Q) :=
theorem succ_inj' {a b : mynat} (hs : succ(a) = succ(b)) :  a = b :=
theorem succ_succ_inj {a b : mynat} (h : succ(succ(a)) = succ(succ(b))) :  a = b :=
theorem succ_eq_succ_of_eq {a b : mynat} : a = b → succ(a) = succ(b) :=
theorem succ_eq_succ_iff (a b : mynat) : succ a = succ b ↔ a = b :=
theorem add_right_cancel (a t b : mynat) : a + t = b + t → a = b :=
theorem add_left_cancel (t a b : mynat) : t + a = t + b → a = b :=
theorem add_right_cancel_iff (t a b : mynat) :  a + t = b + t ↔ a = b :=
lemma eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self {a b : mynat} : a + b = a → b = 0 :=
theorem succ_ne_zero (a : mynat) : succ a ≠ 0 :=
lemma add_left_eq_zero {{a b : mynat}} (H : a + b = 0) : b = 0 :=
lemma add_right_eq_zero {a b : mynat} : a + b = 0 → a = 0 :=
theorem add_one_eq_succ (d : mynat) : d + 1 = succ d :=
lemma ne_succ_self (n : mynat) : n ≠ succ n :=
theorem mul_pos (a b : mynat) : a ≠ 0 → b ≠ 0 → a * b ≠ 0 :=

theorem eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero (a b : mynat) (h : a * b = 0) :
  a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
theorem mul_eq_zero_iff (a b : mynat): a * b = 0 ↔ a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : mynat) (ha : a ≠ 0) : a * b = a * c → b = c :=
lemma one_add_le_self (x : mynat) : x ≤ 1 + x :=
lemma le_refl (x : mynat) : x ≤ x :=
theorem le_succ (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b → a ≤ (succ b) :=
lemma zero_le (a : mynat) : 0 ≤ a :=
theorem le_trans (a b c : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hbc : b ≤ c) : a ≤ c :=
theorem le_antisymm (a b : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hba : b ≤ a) : a = b :=
lemma le_zero (a : mynat) (h : a ≤ 0) : a = 0 :=
lemma succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) (h : a ≤ b) : succ a ≤ succ b :=
theorem le_total (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∨ b ≤ a :=
lemma le_succ_self (a : mynat) : a ≤ succ a :=
theorem add_le_add_right {a b : mynat} : a ≤ b → ∀ t, (a + t) ≤ (b + t) :=
theorem le_of_succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ succ b → a ≤ b :=
theorem not_succ_le_self (a : mynat) : ¬ (succ a ≤ a) :=

theorem add_le_add_left {a b : mynat} (h : a ≤ b) (t : mynat) :
  t + a ≤ t + b :=
lemma lt_aux_one (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) → succ a ≤ b :=
lemma lt_aux_two (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ b → a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) :=
lemma lt_iff_succ_le (a b : mynat) : a < b ↔ succ a ≤ b :=
